newsitem.title: POLAND: Amerbank '97 net seen up to PLN 10.2 mln.
newsitem.headline: Amerbank '97 net seen up to PLN 10.2 mln.

text.p: The brokerage unit of Polish Development Bank SA (PBR) expects Polish Bank Amerykanski w Polsce Amerbank SA's net profit to rise to 10.2 million zlotys in 1997, up from 6.5 million last year, PBR said.
PBR did not give its own forecast for 1996 but Amerbank earlier said it expected to net eight million zlotys this year.

PBR said in a report dated September 24 and released on September 30 Amerbank's price-earnings ratio was seen growing to 11.0 this year from last year's 8.7 but should fall on improved earnings to 8.6 in 1997. @
The average price-earnings ratio for banks listed on the Warsaw Stock Exchange is 9.9.
